data.name: Linaro Virtual Connect 2020
data.description: Every six months, over 300 of the world’s leading open source engineers working on Arm get together for a full week of engineering sessions and hacking at Linaro Connect.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
relatedRecords.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!
